name: Legend of 50
description:
Lank, the protagonist of Legend of 50, is not Link, the protagonist of Legend of Zelda. Lank does not have as long a reach with his sword swipe. Lank cannot use a hookshot or a bow and arrow. What can Lank do? He can venture from room to identical room slaying everything from skeletons to bats and stepping on pressure plates to unlock the door to yet another room. Sound exciting? Then enjoy. 

Created in LOVE2D while following Harvard's cs50 lecture series.
